statements: SELECT * FROM customers_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customers_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 456;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customers_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM customers_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers_transactions WHERE transaction_amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customers_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM customers_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND is_fraudulent = FALSE LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM customers_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_amount - min_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customers c LEFT JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 3, 4) AND customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_description FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_details;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_address = 'New York';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT flagged_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions JOIN transactions ON flagged_transactions.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, account_type, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' AND account_balance > 5000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, f.flag_reason FROM transactions t JOIN flags f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 500 AND f.flag_reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY t.transaction_amount DESC;
